title: Which college is better, among Bharti College, PGDAV College and Ramanujan College in Delhi University for a B.Com.? I passed 12th with 89%. - Quora
tags: Pannalal Girdharlal Dayanand Anglo Vedic, University of Delhi

response.answer_text: In my opinion the colleges you mentioned above, Ramanujan college literally stands out among them, Its not that i am a student of Ramanujan college thats why i am bragging about it, but literally its the college that i have seen growing in front of me in my 3 years in college and goshh….!! what a phenomenal progress it has made, and let me remind you that it now has a great campus plus it has smart classes with Acs and a really student friendly atmosphere other than that the faculties here are very much approachable and are always available. Further, it is surrounded by great food joints, Caffes, Lounges, bars and the whole kalkaji market that will literally make your off campus life chilled out too. Go for Ramanujan college without hesitation…!! Have a great day…!!

PGDAV is not a good college. Ramanujan is new college (I have no idea about that one) I would suggest you to go for colleges in north campus and compromise on course coz college is more important than course.
